name: Solace Design System Lite
description:
The Solace Design System is built to utilize the full power of Figma while giving you complete control over the products you're building. By using our components, you can drastically decrease the amount of time needed to create high-fidelity designs and ensure that these designs are functional, consistent, and look fantastic.


The Lite version of the solace design system is completely free for anyone to use in personal or commercial projects.


For a more robust design system, please check out the Pro version.


Pro Version:

  • 26K+ Components and Variants
  • 300+ Color Styles
  • 200+ Custom Icons
  • 60 Typography Styles


Preview Pro Version

Buy Pro Version
